title: Survey of New Cola
question_text: Soft drink manufacturers want to introduce a new flavor of spicy cola to compete with the leading brand of cola. They went to a local shopping mall and administered a blind taste test that included the new spicy cola and the leading cola brand. They surveyed $100\text{ subjects}$ , and gave each of them an unmarked cup of each cola, in randomized order. The researchers found that $56$ liked the new cola better. This is an example of

choices.text: A blocking experiment, where cola type is a block.
